website_summaries.verdict: The ViewSonic VP2780-4K is a feature-rich 27-inch UHD monitor that delivers very accurate colors, excellent grayscale performance, and sharp image detail.
Our top pick for midrange monitors, the ViewSonic VP2768 is a feature-loaded 27-inch IPS display that delivers excellent color and grayscale performance, and is hardware-calibration ready.

customer_reviews.title: For a photographer, fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: As a hobbyist photographer, I decided it was time to upgrade my aging monitor, and after a lot of research I settled on the ViewSonic VP2768, and I've not been disappointed. The colours are fantastic - and it's defintely helped me getting colour-accurate prints, being 100% sRGB - and the clarity is great, and at 27" it's plenty big enough. My only gripe is that the auto-rotate software seems flaky at best, but given that I didn't buy it for that functionality (and I'd rarely use it in portrait mode anyway), then it doesn't warrant losing a star. Oh, and as an occasional gamer, it's held up perfectly well for the games I play :-)
customer_reviews.author: Richard O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because I couldn't be bothered to wait ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I couldn't be bothered to wait for the ASUS PG27UQ. So the instructions were really weird and should be re-written. To add to this, constant flickering with black screen which I assume the monitor just turns itself off for a second. It varies to when it happens... I have installed the drivers and ensured all the connections are in place. I can only say at this moment that I am happy about the visual but no so with the current problems with this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Dramatic Pulse

customer_reviews.title: Used like new
customer_reviews.text: Used like new would be a more apt description of my second hand monitor, are you sure you did not send a new one bye mistake. Even had the pleasure of unpacking from original packaging which Viewsonic do really well. It is up and running and meets all my expections, thought I would never be able to afford a really proper display for my Photoshopping. I will comment further when I done some work on it. Thanks! really great value.
customer_reviews.author: Bobber

customer_reviews.title: Its as good as they come.
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor primarily for photo editing. It was easy to set up and the immage quality excellent. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Leahy

customer_reviews.title: Great visuals but zero sound, I’d give it 3.5 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is great, however like an earlier review I’m also suffering with no sound coming from the monitor. Tried everything, switching between HDMI and DisplayPort, updating drivers for the monitor, graphics card everything, still no sound. I always planned to purchase dedicated speakers as my purpose for this monitor is video editing, so I built speakers wouldn’t cut it anyway, so I’ll just buy these sooner rather than messing around with returning it. Sort your quality control out Viewsonic
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to set up - Only gripe Is that the inbuilt menu doesn’t stay on screen long enough
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Fran Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: My second model as I needed two monitors. Very good picture and reliable colours

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a seriously good monitor with lots of inputs - the quality of the panel is superb, super sharp and bright - I'm not a gamer so the 60 Hz refresh rate is sufficient for me - I use my mainly for work and media consumption and the picture quality is better than my BenQ (also 2K) which I also use as a dual monitor setup. So much so that I'm tempted to get another to replace the BenQ
customer_reviews.author: Anita Spanky

customer_reviews.title: Great 1080p productivity monitor
customer_reviews.text: Use this as a secondary monitor in portrait mode. Even though it's basically just used to show my discord or Spotify and maybe the odd football stream it's a great monitor. The lack of bazels makes it pretty simple for it to match whatever monitor you may already have. Definitely recommend. May even get another one.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, decent price, amazing picture quality. Mainly used it for reading documents but overall very happy with it, will explore the photography side of it soon

product_meta.title: ViewSonic VP2768 27-Inch WQHD Professional Monitor with 100% sRGB, Delta E<2, MST DaisyChain, Hardware Colour Calibration, HDMI, DisplayPort, Mini DisplayPort for Graphic Design, Photo & Video Editing
product_meta.description:
Style Name:27 Inch WQHDEngineered to deliver unmatched colour accuracy crucial for professional applications, the ViewSonic VP2768 WQHD monitor displays your work with the vivid and lifelike colour it deserves. With a SuperClear IPS panel and a sleek frameless design, the VP2768 provides a near-seamless viewing experience ideal for multi-monitor setups. For simple, single-cable daisy chaining of multiple monitors, the VP2768 is equipped with future-proof DisplayPort technology, in addition to HDMI. To ensure precise, uniform colour, each of ViewSonic's monitors is factory calibrated to deliver an amazing Delta E<2 value for colour accuracy. An integrated colour uniformity function ensures consistent chromaticity across the screen, while a 14-bit 3D look-up table generates a stunningly smooth palette of 4.39 trillion colours. Add to that 6-axis colour adjustment functionality and this monitor provides the colour processing capability for professional applications. What’s more, an enhanced ergonomic design delivers customised comfort for increased productivity. Hardware calibration function is also available which allows you to quickly and easily calibrate the monitor for photography, graphic design, content creation and other colour-critical applications, when working at home or in the office environment.

feature_bullets: IDEAL FOR GRAPHIC DESIGN, PHOTOGRAPHY AND VIDEO EDITING: 27-inch WQHD (2560x1440p) SuperClear IPS monitor delivers lifelike colours perfect for graphic designers, photographers, video editors and more.
ULTIMATE COLOUR ACCURACY: Screen wide sRGB, EBU, SMPTE-C, Rec. 709, and DICOM-SIM colour spaces, Delta E<2 accuracy, and a smooth palette of 4.39 trillion colours deliver precise and vivid images.

4-SIDED FRAMELESS DESIGN: 4 sided frameless design creates a seamless visual experience when using multi-monitor setups without the distraction of a bulky border. Users can enjoy a cleaner and smoother editing experience when extending content, while working at home or the office.

HARDWARE COLOUR CALIBRATION: Quick and easy calibration ensures that the colour displayed perfectly matches the original file. Every unit is pre-calibrated at the factory and comes included with an individualised colour calibration report.

PRODUCTIVITY BOOSTING FEATURES: The monitor features full range of swivel, pivot, tilt, and height adjustment as well as a built-in G sensor allowing screen images to pivot automatically and filling the screen when positioned vertically.
FLEXIBLE CONNECTIVITY: The VP2768 supports laptops, PCs, and Apple/Mac operating systems with HDMI 1.4, USB, DisplayPort (Daisy chain enabled), and Mini DisplayPort inputs.
BOX CONTAINS: LCD Monitor, Power Cable, Mini DP to DP Cable, and USB 3.0 Cable.
